TOC

MINDSTORMS Resources

We often get asked about resources for learning to program with EV3.

Free Organized Curriculum for MINDSTORMS Programming

This list of resources only includes organized curriculum resources for MINDSTORMS that focus on EV3 programming. It does not include individual YouTube channels unless there is a distinct curriculum provided.

EV3Lessons: Comprehensive programming tutorials for Beginner through Advanced and Beyond
CMU Robotics Academy : Complete introductory curriculum for the EV3
LEGO Education: Various curriculum created by LEGO Education
STEMCentric: Mostly introductory-level with a few intermediate-level topics.
STEMRobotics: Well organized repository for educational materials and curriculum guides for robotics.
WAFFLES Community Robotics: Comprehensive block by block introduction to programming by a FIRST team. ()

Curriculum for School Teachers

Kee, Damien. Classroom Activities for the Busy Teacher: EV3
STEMRobotics: Well organized repository for educational materials and curriculum guides for robotics.
LEGOEngineering: Developed by TUFTS CEEO. Has a variety of resources and projects.

Organization and Planning Resources for FLL Teams

EV3Lessons: Has mission planning worksheets, calculators and templates useful for teams. Also host several online/interactive tools such as a Sketcher for teams to map out missions. Resources are updated every season.
Techbrick: Has worksheets, images and blank templates for use by teams. Resources are updated every season. Information from previous seasons are archived so if you need access to materials from older challenges, you can find them here.

Stores to buy parts for your EV3

LEGO
LEGO Education
Use for specific parts and complete sets Bricklink.com or Brickowl.com Mindsensors and HiTechnic offer non-LEGO branded sensors that are compatible with the EV3

Books

Benedettelli, Daniele. The LEGO MINDSTORMS EV3 Laboratory
Isogawa, Yoshihito. The LEGO MINDSTORMS EV3 Idea Book
Isogawa, Yoshihito. The LEGO Technic Idea Book
Kmiec, Pawel. The Unofficial LEGO Technic Builder’s Guide
Kee, Damien. Classroom Activities for the Busy Teacher
Valk, Laurens. The LEGO MINDSTORMS EV3 Discovery Book

FIRST Steps
